description: Platform improvements identified through comprehensive codebase analysis - covering conversion optimization, UX improvements, security hardening, SEO, admin tooling, and marketing features.

userStories.title: Checkout page platform fee bug fix and trust signal improvements
userStories.description: As a buyer, I need the checkout page to display accurate platform fees (using the usePlatformFee hook instead of a hardcoded 10% rate), see a checkout progress indicator so I know where I am in the process, and see trust signals (SSL encryption, purchase protection, Stripe security) so I feel confident completing my purchase.
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout.tsx uses usePlatformFee hook instead of hardcoded PLATFORM_FEE_RATE = 0.1
Platform fee display shows dynamic rate from database config
Checkout progress indicator shows Cart > Details > Payment > Done steps
Trust signals section displays SSL, Stripe, purchase protection, and local maker support badges
Build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Completed - hardcoded fee was a pricing accuracy bug that could charge customers the wrong amount if fees were updated in the database.

userStories.title: Exit-intent email capture popup for landing page
userStories.description: As a marketing team member, I need an exit-intent popup on the landing page that captures visitor emails with a 10% discount offer, so we can reduce bounce rates and build our email list for remarketing campaigns.
acceptanceCriteria: Exit-intent popup triggers when mouse leaves viewport at top (desktop)
Mobile fallback triggers on scroll-up pattern after scrolling past 500px
Popup only shows to non-authenticated visitors
7-day cooldown after dismissal stored in localStorage
8-second delay before popup becomes eligible
Email submitted to newsletter-subscribe edge function with source='exit_intent'
GA4 event tracked on conversion
Build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Completed - lazy loaded to avoid impacting LCP. Uses existing newsletter-subscribe infrastructure.

userStories.title: Add checkout trust signals to GuestCheckout page
userStories.description: As a guest buyer, I need to see the same trust signals and checkout progress indicator on the guest checkout page that authenticated users see, so I feel equally confident completing my purchase without an account.
acceptanceCriteria: GuestCheckout.tsx includes checkout progress indicator matching Checkout.tsx
Trust signal badges (SSL, Stripe, purchase protection) displayed in payment summary
Consistent visual design with authenticated checkout flow
Build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Guest checkout already has some trust text but lacks the visual trust badges and progress indicator.

userStories.title: Cart abandonment recovery with email reminders
userStories.description: As a platform operator, I need authenticated users who add items to their cart but don't complete checkout within 24 hours to receive an email reminder about their cart, so we can recover abandoned purchases.
acceptanceCriteria: Cart state persisted to database for authenticated users (currently localStorage only)
Edge function sends cart reminder email after 24 hours of inactivity
Email contains cart item images, titles, and prices
Include a direct link back to the cart page
Users can opt out of cart reminders in notification settings
Track email open and click-through rates
userStories.notes: Cart is currently localStorage-only, so cart data is lost across devices and can't trigger server-side emails.

userStories.title: Product image zoom and gallery improvements
userStories.description: As a buyer, I need to be able to zoom into product images and swipe through a fullscreen gallery on mobile, so I can inspect handmade items closely before purchasing.
acceptanceCriteria: Click-to-zoom on product detail page images
Fullscreen lightbox gallery with swipe support on mobile
Pinch-to-zoom support on touch devices
Keyboard navigation (arrow keys, Escape to close)
Smooth transitions between images
No impact on initial page load (lazy loaded)
userStories.notes: Current product page has basic image display. Zoom is critical for handmade goods where buyers want to see craftsmanship details.

userStories.title: Social sharing for product pages
userStories.description: As a buyer, I need to share products I find on social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, X, copy link), so I can recommend handmade items to friends and help makers get more exposure.
acceptanceCriteria: Share button on product detail page with platform options
Native Web Share API used on mobile when available
Fallback share buttons for desktop (Facebook, Pinterest, X, copy link)
Open Graph meta tags already in place for rich previews
Share event tracked in analytics
Accessible button labels
userStories.notes: Product pages have OG tags but no share UI. Pinterest is especially valuable for handmade/craft products.

userStories.title: Empty search results improvement with recommendations
userStories.description: As a buyer, when my search returns no results, I need to see helpful suggestions (related categories, popular items, spelling corrections) instead of just an empty state, so I can still find relevant products.
acceptanceCriteria: Empty search results page shows: 'Did you mean?' spelling suggestions
Display popular/trending products as alternatives
Show related category links based on search terms
Offer to set up a notification for when matching products are listed
Track zero-result searches in analytics for admin review
userStories.notes: SearchBar has correction suggestions but SearchResults empty state is basic. Zero-result tracking would help admins understand demand gaps.

userStories.title: Seller onboarding email sequence
userStories.description: As a new seller, I need to receive a structured email onboarding sequence (welcome, listing tips, pricing guide, first sale celebration) so I'm guided through setting up a successful shop.
acceptanceCriteria: Day 0: Welcome email with quick start guide link
Day 2: Listing optimization tips with examples of top sellers
Day 5: Pricing strategy guide link (existing pricing calculator)
Day 7: Check-in email asking if they need help
After first sale: Celebration email with next steps
Emails stop if seller completes onboarding steps
Unsubscribe option on all emails
userStories.notes: Seller retention is critical for marketplace supply. Currently no automated onboarding emails.

userStories.title: Admin search analytics dashboard enhancements
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a dashboard showing zero-result searches, most popular searches, search-to-purchase conversion rates, and trending search terms, so I can identify demand gaps and improve product discovery.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows top 50 zero-result searches with frequency
Search-to-purchase conversion funnel visualization
Trending searches over time (7d, 30d, 90d views)
Export to CSV functionality
Real-time updates using Supabase realtime subscription
Actionable insights like 'Create category for X - searched 47 times this week'
userStories.notes: Search analytics data is being collected but admin dashboard needs better visualization and actionable insights.

userStories.title: Structured data for product pages (Schema.org Product markup)
userStories.description: As an SEO strategist, I need every product detail page to include complete Schema.org Product markup (including price, availability, seller, reviews, images) so products appear as rich results in Google Search.
acceptanceCriteria: Product pages include @type Product with name, description, image
Offers schema with price, priceCurrency, availability, seller
AggregateRating if product has reviews
Brand set to seller shop name
Validate with Google Rich Results Test
No duplicate or conflicting schema on the page
userStories.notes: Landing page has Organization and LocalBusiness schema, but individual product pages likely missing Product schema for rich Google results.

userStories.title: Recently viewed products widget
userStories.description: As a buyer, I need to see my recently viewed products on the browse page and product detail pages, so I can easily go back to items I was interested in without searching again.
acceptanceCriteria: Recently viewed products displayed as horizontal scrollable carousel
Shows on browse page below search results and on product detail page below main content
Stores last 12 viewed products in localStorage
Each card shows image, title, price, and seller name
Click navigates to product detail page
Clear history option available
Responsive design for mobile
userStories.notes: useRecentlyViewed hook exists but may not be integrated into the browse/product UI. Low effort, high value for return visitors.

userStories.title: Mobile checkout optimization
userStories.description: As a mobile buyer, I need the checkout flow to be optimized for small screens with larger touch targets, auto-scrolling to errors, collapsible sections, and a persistent total bar, so I can complete purchases quickly on my phone.
acceptanceCriteria: Input fields have minimum 48px touch targets on mobile
Form auto-scrolls to first validation error on submit
Collapsible order summary section on mobile (expanded by default on desktop)
Sticky bottom bar with total and pay button (already on Cart, extend to Checkout)
Auto-advance to next input on mobile keyboards
Apple Pay / Google Pay button prominently placed at top on mobile
userStories.notes: Cart has a sticky mobile checkout bar, but the Checkout page doesn't. Mobile users are the majority of traffic but checkout isn't optimized for them.

userStories.title: Seller performance dashboard with actionable metrics
userStories.description: As a seller, I need a performance dashboard showing views-to-favorites ratio, listing conversion rates, response time metrics, and revenue trends, so I can understand what's working and improve my shop.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows: total views, favorites, add-to-carts, and purchases per listing
Conversion funnel: view > favorite > cart > purchase with percentages
Average response time to messages with benchmark comparison
Revenue chart with daily/weekly/monthly views
Top performing listings highlighted
Underperforming listings flagged with improvement suggestions
userStories.notes: Seller dashboard exists but may lack granular conversion analytics. This data drives seller retention and listing quality.

userStories.title: Cookie consent banner compliance
userStories.description: As a compliance officer, I need a GDPR/CCPA-compliant cookie consent banner that allows users to accept, reject, or customize cookie preferences before any non-essential cookies are set, so the platform meets privacy regulations.
acceptanceCriteria: Banner appears on first visit before any analytics cookies are set
Options: Accept All, Reject Non-Essential, Customize
Customize modal shows categories: Essential, Analytics, Marketing
GA4 only initializes after consent for analytics category
Preference stored in localStorage, respected on return visits
Link to Cookie Policy page from the banner
Banner doesn't block page content on mobile
userStories.notes: Cookie Policy page exists but no consent banner. GA4 appears to load unconditionally. Required for GDPR compliance if serving EU visitors.

userStories.title: Performance budget and bundle size monitoring
userStories.description: As a developer, I need automated bundle size checks in CI that warn when JavaScript bundle exceeds performance budgets, so we maintain fast page load times as the codebase grows.
acceptanceCriteria: CI pipeline includes bundle size analysis step
Warning when any chunk exceeds 200KB gzipped
Error when total initial JS exceeds 500KB gzipped
Bundle size report commented on PRs showing delta
Track LCP, FID, CLS metrics in CI
Historical trend available in CI artifacts
userStories.notes: Vite config has manual chunking but no automated size enforcement. 47 Radix packages + framer-motion risk bundle bloat.
